This is the best puzzle game I've played. The puzzles are very-well made because they're not too easy or too hard, it's mainly challenging to solve at first but you start to get the hang of it and start to know more on what to do on solving more of them later on in the game. 

It's atmosphere and ambient music of it is quiet, creepy, and dark with seeing creepy graffiti's made by Doug Rattman and his schizophrenia. It's simple design of it classic with GLaDOS's, Rocket Turret, and the Cores models. I really recommend this game to people who would want to play puzzle games. Thank you, Valve for making this awesome puzzle game.

Portal is a classic game that was originally included as a bonus game in Valve's very popular 'Orange Box' bundle back in the day. Back then, it really blew everyone away, taking them completely by surprise with its innovative gameplay and quirky world. It's a short game (about 2.5 hours or so), but it feels complete without overstaying its welcome, which is actually really nice in the era of every game seeming to demand all of your time. It's a cheap game too, so if you haven't experienced Portal's unique gameplay, absolutely give it a shot.

Despite its age, the original Portal is able to hold itself up incredibly well. Replayability is always a blast and earning the achievements and completing the bonus and advanced chambers is challenging but really rewarding. Its simplicity also makes the game really fun and I couldn't recommend this game enough to those who are new to puzzle games and enjoy an engaging story.

A fun mix between FPS and puzzle. I heard a lot about this game throughout the years and always thought of it as kinda different, but it's still nice to play. It also features further challenges to give you some more hours on it, but main gameplay is already very fun. That radio song is still stuck in my mind ever since I went after the achievements. lol

Uma mistura divertida entre FPS e quebra-cabeça. Ouvi muito sobre este jogo através dos anos e sempre pensei que fosse um pouco diferente, mas ainda é bom para jogar. Também apresenta desafios adicionais para te dar mais algumas horas nele, mas o jogo principal já é bem divertido. Aquela música do rádio ainda está presa na minha mente desde quando fui atrás das conquistas. lol

[h3][b] Rating / Nota: 8 / 10 [/b][/h3]
